DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 1560 year , male female . 2 . Mild moderate persistent asthma . 3 . Mini AQLQ score ≤6 ACQ score ≥1 . 4 . Giving write informed consent . 1 . Current smoker quit smoke ≤12 month . 2 . Significant allergen exposure . 3 . Respiratory tract infection within 2 week study . 4 . Cardiovascular disease . 5 . History malignant disease within precede 5 year . 6 . And/or concomitant pulmonary disease . 7 . Pregnant breastfeed period . 8 . Use leukotrienes receptor antagonist within 5 day
